attributes.action: Call for a vote of no confidence in Boris Johnson and the Conservative party.
attributes.additional_details: The current governing party has been consistently and irrefutably incompetent and late when dealing with the current pandemic. This has lead to an unnecessary loss of lives through unclear restrictions and guidance. It is our belief that the current party does not have the best interests in mind for the public, nor their support, any longer.
attributes.background: A Censure movement is required to stop the harm the conservative party is doing to the UK. These actions are not those backed by the people.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You may wish to sign this petition calling for a general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
